00021 // We are going to use unix conventions internally
00022 // and translate them to the os requirements only when needed.
00023 // so we define these here.
00024 #define FS_PATHSEP "/"
00025 //#define FSPATH_INTERNAL_PATHSEP ":"
00026 #define FS_EXTSEP "."
00027 
00028 #define FS_UNC_SHORTLEN (200)
00029
